table.name: vtiger_cbrequestforproposal
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbrequestforproposal` ( `cbrequestforproposalid` int(11) NOT NULL, `cbrequestforproposalno` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `related_client` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `related_vendor` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `offer_status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `version_number` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `document_id` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `doc_date` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `doc_number` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `sigla_prot_type` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `sigla_prot_number` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `sigla_prot_date` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `sigla_internal_number` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `header_note` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `total_amount` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_id` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_sigla_code` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_business_name` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_address1` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_address2` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_cap` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_location` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_address` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_province` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_nation` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_phone` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `invoice_id` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `sigla_address_code` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `business_name_address` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `address_1` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `address_2` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `postal_code` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `invoice_location` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `municipality_address` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `province_address` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `nation_address` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `addr_phone` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `date_offer` date DEFAULT NULL, `subtotal_amount` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `tax_amount` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `success_chance` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `expiration_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `vat_value` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `terms_conditions` text, `agent_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `offer_number` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `rel_docfolder` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `expected_close_date` date DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbrequestforproposalid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbrequestforproposalcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbrequestforproposalcf` ( `cbrequestforproposalid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbrequestforproposalid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
